thread.title: Arbor Hyde Park Hotel
thread.title_full: Arbor Hyde Park Hotel - Review of Arbor Hyde Park Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Elmar W
title: Arbor Hyde Park Hotel
text: nicely renovated boutique hotel with a good continental breakfast buffet - "english breakfast" to be paid; tube station in reasonable walking distance, located next to Kensington Gardens; staff was very helpful; international socket for those who need other than UK plug present;
